definition: Austria/Austrian/abbr. for 奧地利|奥地利[Ao4 di4 li4]/Olympic/Olympics/abbr. for 奧林匹克|奥林匹克[Ao4 lin2 pi3 ke4]

sentences.english: You will feel very confortable in Beijing's Olympic Village.
sentences.chinese: 您將在北京的奧運村生活得非常舒適。

sentences.english: The Beijing Olympic Village is near to the main Olympic venues such as the National Stadium and the National Aquatics Center.
sentences.chinese: 北京奧運村與奧運主場館如國家體育場和水立方相鄰。

sentences.english: When officials opened the Olympic Village over the weekend, visibility was sharply limited by clotted skies.
sentences.chinese: 當上週末奧運村開村時，濃雲造成能見度急劇降低。

sentences.english: Meanwhile, it has been used in the project of Olympic village photovoltaic lighting construction.
sentences.chinese: 其產品也曾在奧運村建設光伏照明項目中投入應用。

sentences.english: Nice to meet you. I'm Zhang Ning. Welcome to the Olympic Village.
sentences.chinese: 見到您很高興，我是張寧，歡迎來到奧運村。
